captions.text:
<i>♪ outside the cars in</i>
<i>the city go rushing by ♪</i>

<i>♪ I search for the beat</i>
<i>in this dirty town ♪</i>

<i>♪ down town</i>
<i>the young ones are going ♪</i>

<i>A way normal life</i>
<i>for a teenage girl.</i>

<i>I mean, I get up,</i>
<i>I brush my teeth,</i>
<i>♪ but we don't do it here ♪</i>

<i>Even lucy, our maid,</i>
<i>is terrified of him.</i>

<i>But he fights with me for free</i>
<i>because I'm his daughter.</i>

Daddy.
Cher, please don't start
with the juice again.

It's been
a couple of months now,

So I said we'd
go out to malibu.

Don't tell me those
brain-dead lowlifes
have been calling again.

And don't try
sneaking out of the office.

comments.text:
+nenabunena You're right. But I like shy guys too. I just don't like guys 
playing games period. I look at direct guys as being confident, not a 
player.
comments.author: SimAddict24

comments.text:
+luv2read100 Maybe, but our cultures are very different.  There are things 
in the West where it's similar but there are many things very 
different too.  A guy who is way too direct seems like a player to me, and 
I prefer torpe shy guys tbh.
comments.author: nenabunena

comments.text:
+nenabunena Maybe its personal and nothing to do with culture. I don't 
know. For that we'd have to get other peoples opinion, but every girl I 
talk to prefer for the guy to be direct, but a gentleman about it.
comments.author: SimAddict24

comments.text:
+luv2read100 Honestly, I think it's a no win situation for guys.  It also 
depends on the culture.  For you, you like direct guys, personally I 
don't.  In my country, most guys are very indirect which is why I sometimes 
get uncomfortable around foreign guys, I'm afraid they will be way too 
direct for me as I find it offensive.  So whichever a girl is, a guy can 
only guess and analyze his next move.  I can't imagine it's easy for a guy 
to analyze a girl's preference, lol.
comments.author: nenabunena

comments.text:
+nenabunena You don't necessarily have to kiss a girl to be ballsy or 
direct. I'm just saying I wish some guys would be more direct about liking 
a girl. We like directness. Not necessarily kissing us when you think we're 
giving you the sign. When a guy comes up to me and tells me immediately 
that I'm beautiful and asks me out, I think its hot. I don't like when guys 
come up to me playing games to ask me out. For example, guys often act like 
they know me from somewhere first, then act like they realize I'm not that 
person, but ask me out anyway. That's not a way to ask a girl out. First of 
all, you're comparing me to someone who may or may not even exist. Strike 
number one. That's a turn off. I usually get flustered and interested when 
a guy automatically compliments me, and then asks me out. I'm more than 
likely to say yes or consider it.
comments.author: SimAddict24

comments.text:
but that's dangerous for guys to do, they can be slapped with a sexual 
harassment suit.  guys get mix messages all the time, what if they misread 
your interest or lack of?  they'd be lucky if all they get is a slap
comments.author: nenabunena

comments.text:
I never said I wouldn't if he looked like frog, I definitely wouldn't kiss 
him lol Looks matter, but only to a certain extent. But I was basically 
talking about the guys I make it really obvious I like, while they're still 
trying to decipher my feelings. I'm like, "HELLO! I LIKE YOU!!!" But not 
literally like that, that would be crazy..XD
comments.author: SimAddict24

comments.text:
Be honest, if the guy was cute or you found him attractive you would swoon 
but if he looked like a frog, you probably would slap him.
